title.en: The Grown Dog Bullies Its Owner

altTitles.th: เจ้าสุนัขตัวโตรังแกเจ้านายอีกแล้ว

description.en:
[Black-bellied top student x Two-faced school grass]
"You there, be mine!"

School grass Xia Zhixing, unwilling to reveal his identity as a streamer, borrows the face of the mysterious top student Lin Lang.

Unexpectedly, the student that resembled a cute little puppy had actually desired him for a long time...

"Senior, the reward I want is you."

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

altTitles.ja: メドゥーサ奴隷を買った

description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

title.en: Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE! feat. Hatsune Miku Comic Anthology

altTitles.ja: プロジェクトセカイ カラフルステージ！ feat.初音ミク　コミックアンソロジー

description.en: Official anthology for the game Project Sekai

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

title.en: Boku to Majo ni Tsuite no Bibouroku

altTitles.en: A Memorandum About Me and the Witch

altTitles.ja: 僕と魔女についての備忘録

altTitles.zh: 关于我和魔女的备忘录

description.en:
Wataru was picked up by a 100+ year old witch in a certain forest when he was a little boy. Some time later, he began to write about his daily life so that he would never forget those lovely days he spent with her and her cat Hotaru. When he began to have "special feelings" for the witch who raised him as a member of the family, he realised that one day he would surpass her age... 
A sad love story between a witch and a human that slowly passes through time.

Mirai, a man who does not show his emotions, lives happily with his innocent and cheerful wife Meguru, but he has a "cursed disease" that he keeps secret even from his wife.
Then one day, Mirai receives an important call from the police concerning his wife...!

**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

altTitles.vi: Lời tuyên án của Đức Mẹ

description.ar: بعد وفاة ابنها بطريقة مروعة، تكتشف والدتهُ تنمر الآخرين الشديد عليه، فعقدت العزم على معاقبة أولئك المتنمرين الذين أخذوا ابنها الحبيب منها، وبدأت العمل كممرضة في المدرسة
description.en: The Nagare family was a happy home of three people. However, their son Kiritaka was secretly bullied at school. Then, an incident occurs, and the mother Mari's love for her son goes out of control.
description.ne: आमाबुवा र छोरासहित ३ जनाको नागारे परिवारको खुसीको घर थियो। तर, उनीहरुको छोरा किरिताकालाई विद्यालयमा गोप्य रुपमा कुटपिट गरिएको थियो।  त्यसपछि, एउटा घटना घट्छ, र आमा मारियाको छोराप्रतिको माया अनियन्त्रित हुन्छ।
description.vi:
Một gia đình ba người những tưởng đang hạnh phúc, cho đến khi Kiritaka, người con trai duy nhất của Nagare Mari "tự sát" vì "quá đau khổ". Cho rằng bản thân đã vô tình dồn ép con trai yêu quý, Mari toang tìm đến cái chết, nhưng không... cô vô tình phát hiện ra sự thật con trai mình đã liên tục bị bắt nạt suốt một thời gian dài bởi những con quỷ đội lốt người tại trường học.
Và rồi tình thương con da diết của Mari... đã vượt ngoài tầm kiểm soát của trái tim cô.
description.es-la: La familia Nagare era un hogar feliz formado por tres personas. Sin embargo, su hijo Kiritaka sufría acoso escolar extremo en secreto. Entonces, ocurre un incidente que haría que el amor de la madre, Mari, se descontrolara por completo.

description.en: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her ... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this? A fascinating erotic story drawn by Jura from the popular doujin circle "JACK-POT".
description.ja: 人生で初めてできた、かわいい彼女。でもその友達は、彼女よりも豊満なカラダで僕を誘惑してきて…。彼女の友達にこんな風に迫られたら、あなたはどうしますか？ 大人気同人サークル「JACK-POT」のじゅらが描く、魅惑の背徳物語。

title.en: Kono Koi wo Hoshi ni wa Negawanai

altTitles.ja: この恋を星には願わない

altTitles.en: There is No Love Wishing Upon a Star

description.en:
Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever.

And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.
description.ja: 幼い頃からいつも一緒に過ごしてきた冬葵と瑛莉と京。これまでずっと友達としての関係を続けてきたが、冬葵は瑛莉に対して友達以上の感情を抱いていた。そんなある日、３人は久々に遊園地に遊びにいくのだが、そこで冬葵は自身の恋が叶わぬものであると知ってしまい――

title.en: Souzou Renkinjutsushi wa Jiyuu wo Ouka suru: Kokyou wo Tsuihou saretara, Maou no Ohizamoto de Chouzetsu Kouka no Magic Item Tsukuri-houdai ni Narimashita

altTitles.en: The Creation Alchemist Enjoys Freedom -If I Am Exiled From My Hometown, I Can Make Magic Items With Transcendent Effects at the Knees of the Demon Lord-

altTitles.ja: 創造錬金術師は自由を謳歌する 故郷を追放されたら、魔王のお膝元で超絶効果のマジックアイテム作り放題になりました

description.en:
Thor Regus, a boy who lived in the empire, was banished to the territory of the Demon Lord by the hands of his father, the Duke.

The reason was that he could only use [Alchemy] and didn’t have any combat skills.

The empire was a military country, and those without combat skills were discriminated against.

That is why the Empire decided to make him a hostage and sacrifice to the Demon Territory.

This is a story about an exiled boy who transcends Empires and Heroes and transforms the Demon Territory into a civilised power.
description.pt-br:
Thor Regus, um garoto que vivia no império, foi banido para o território do Lorde Demônio pelas mãos de seu pai, o Duque.

A razão era que ele só podia usar [Alquimia] e não tinha nenhuma habilidade de combate.

O império era um país militar e aqueles que não tinham habilidades de combate eram discriminados.

É por isso que o Império decidiu torná-lo refém e sacrificá-lo ao Território Demoníaco.

Esta é a história de um garoto exilado que transcende Impérios e Heróis e transforma o Território Demoníaco em um poder civilizado.

description.en: When she loses her calm, she is unable to use magic. In order to become a great witch, Merrily has lived her life according to her mother's teachings, keeping her mind clear no matter what. Then one day, Merrily meets a boy named Danka. As she interacts with him, Merrily's heart changes...

title.en: Westa no Daidokoro -Wasureta Boku no Sekai Gohan-

altTitles.ja: ウェスタの台所 ―忘れたぼくの世界ごはん―

altTitles.ja-ro: Uuesuta no Daidokoro -Wasureta Boku no Sekai Gohan-

altTitles.en: Vestal's Kitchen: My Forgotten World Gourmet
Vestal's Kitchen: Amnesiac Me and World Gourmet

description.en:
***In search of lost memories... The clue is in "World Gourmet"!***

Kasumi, a boarding house caretaker for foreigners is tasked with taking in a boy named Haru, a boy with amnesia who wandered into her yard. However, Haru's origins are a mystery, and no one, including the residents, can find any clues to his memory. So Kasumi makes a proposal: 

"If we feed him different cuisines from all over the world, we may be able to find a taste of his homeland!"

―This story is a record of a boy who tastes gourmet foods from all over the world in order to regain his memory. (MTL)
description.ja: 外国人専用下宿で寮母を務める夏純は、庭先に迷い込んだ記憶喪失の少年・ハルを保護することになった。しかしハルの出自には謎が多く、誰もハルの記憶の手がかりを掴めなかった。そこで夏純は提案する。「世界中の郷土料理を食べさせれば、いつかハルの故郷の味が見つかるかもしれない！」

altTitles.zh: 神乎其技 - 特效化妝師

description.en: Kohei Nagase is an prodigy special effects artist. He and pro stuntman, Shingo Kannazuki, form Studio Gimmick. Together, they help people in need of Studio Gimmick's exceptional services. These people's problems are often able to be solved with Kohei's stunning special effects skills.

A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---
description.fr:
Un monde dans lequel la Corée est le Pays leader des sports de combats. Au lycée Nam-il où les meilleurs et plus talentueux élèves en arts martiaux étudient, Jiu Ji-tae se trouve soudainement entraîné avec eux alors qu'il n'est qu'un faiblard.  
  
En faisant disparaître ses défauts physiques à l'aide du Ju-Jitsu, pourra-t-il devenir le meilleur des classes de combat ?  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mymmx89)
description.pt-br:
Em um mundo onde a Coréia do Sul é a capital mundial dos esportes de combate, o Colégio Namil é onde os melhores e mais talentosos estudantes de artes marciais competem, e nosso protagonista Jiu Jitei se encontra subitamente em meio à eles mesmo sendo um fracote completo.
  
Superando suas fraquezas com jiu-jitsu, será que Jitei consegue chegar ao topo das turmas de luta?

description.en:
"Are you the one who called me…?"

A black-haired beast looked at him with glowing yellow eyes.

"It’s okay. It won't hurt anymore. You'll be okay."

Estio was born as the youngest son of a farmer, but everyone hated him. He was a child who could read the hearts of people and animals. And…

"A cursed child."

He finally turned 19, and it was now time for his coming-of-age ceremony. Now starts Estio's journey to find happiness.

---
Estio is just an ordinary farmer's son, but with an extraordinary ability-he can read the thoughts and memories of humans and animals. For this, he is shunned by the people in his village, finding happiness only in his animal friends. After years of silently enduring the villagers' hostility, Estio runs away the night he turns 19. His journey brings unexpected friendships and encounters, but will such bonds be able to show him there is more to him and his ability than meets the eye?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.fr:
«Es-tu celui qui m'a appelé...?»

Une bête aux cheveux noirs l'a regardé avec des yeux jaunes brillants.

«Tout va bien. Ça ne fera plus mal. Tu vas t'en sortir.»

Éstio est né comme le plus jeune fils d'un fermier, mais tout le monde le détestait. C'était un enfant qui pouvait lire dans le cœur des gens et des animaux. Et...

«Un enfant maudit.»

Il a finalement eu 19 ans, et c'est maintenant le moment de sa cérémonie de passage à l'âge adulte. Maintenant commence le voyage d'Éstio pour trouver le bonheur.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.ko:
"날 부른 게... 당신입니까?"
까만 털의 짐승이 노랗게 빛나는 눈으로 그를 올려다보았다.
"이제 괜찮습니다. 더는 아프지 않을 겁니다. 괜찮으니까."

농가의 막내 아들로 태어난 소년 에스티오.
하지만 모든 사람들은 그를 미워했다.
사람과 동물들의 마음을 읽는 아이.
그리고...

"저주 받은 아이"

마침내 열아홉 살을 맞이한 성년식.
행복을 찾기 위한 에스티오의 여정이 지금 시작된다.

—

공든탑 작가님의 웹소설 인기작 <에스티오> 본격 웹툰화!
사람과 동물의 마음을 치유하는 여스티오의 여정에 함께 하세요!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
description.ru:
«Это ты звал меня?» Черношёрстный зверь смотрел на него снизу своими жёлтыми сияющими глазами. «Теперь всё хорошо. Больше не будет больно. Поэтому всё хорошо». Эстио – младший сын, рождённый в семье фермера. Но все люди его презирали. Он ребёнок, который читает души животных и людей. И… «Ребёнок, получивший проклятие». Наконец, церемония взросления, которая проводится, как только человеку исполняется 19 лет. И вот Эстио отправляется в путешествие, чтобы обрести своё счастье. По мотивам веб-романа известного писателя Кон Дынтхапа.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)

altTitles.en: Isshiki-san Wants to Know About Love.

altTitles.ja-ro: Koutetsu no Rinna wa XX Saretai.

altTitles.ja: 一式さんは恋を知りたい。
鋼鉄のリンナは××されたい

altTitles.zh-hk: 一式小姐想要知曉戀愛。

altTitles.zh-ro: Gāngtiě zhí nǚ xiǎng bèi xx
Yīshì xiǎojiě xiǎng yào zhīxiǎo liàn'ài.
Gāngtiě de lín nà xiǎng bèi xx

description.en:
A maiden who doesn't know what love is tries her hand at dating as a pseudo-couple!

Inspector Rinna, who is respected by everyone as a hard-working and serious policewoman, seems to be having trouble with her work lately. The reason for this is because she loses focus. It only happens when Meishi, the detective she works with, is around… So, she makes a choice…?
description.ja:
堅物で真面目な警察官だと周りから尊敬されている一式警部は、最近どうも仕事がうまくいかないご様子。
その原因は一緒に仕事をしている探偵・六反田がいる時にばかり起こってしまう…。
とあることから悩みの原因が判明した彼女は、問題を解決すべく六反田探偵と擬似カップルとして付き合うことになったが…？
恋を知らない乙女が擬似カップルとしてお付き合いに大挑戦な、ラブコメディ！

※2話目まで旧タイトル「鋼鉄のリンナは××されたい」表記となります。
description.pt-br:
Uma donzela que não sabe o que é o amor, experimenta o namoro como um pseudo-casal!

A inspectora Rinna, que é respeitada por todos como uma agente policial trabalhadora e séria, parece estar a ter problemas com o seu trabalho ultimamente. A razão para isto é porque ela perde o foco. Isto só acontece quando Meishi, o detective com quem ela trabalha, está por perto. Então, ela faz uma escolha…?

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

For five years, she's been eating at the set-meal restaurant but didn't feel comfortable saying anything more, and the waitress at the restaurant who wanted to talk to that regular customer but couldn't get the words out. Their feelings are leaking out, but they just couldn't express their love for each other in many ways.

---
- **Note:**
*Kuchibeta Shokudou*, originally released under the title *Otagai Iitai Koto ga Ienai Tenin Okyakusan no Manga* (お互い言いたいことが言えない店員とお客さんの漫画), is a web manga released on the [author's Twitter account](https://twitter.com/i/events/1378283683996528643) since February 15, 2019, and it was picked up for commercial publication on December 10, 2021.
---
- [<ComicWalker>](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_EB01202726010000_68/)
- [<Pixiv Comic>](https://comic.pixiv.net/works/8121)
description.ja:
５年間、入りたいと思ってもなかなか定食屋さんに入れなかったお客さんと
入ってほしいと願いつつも、なかなか入ってもらえなかった、ほんの少しお客さんの少ない定食屋の店員さん。
心の声はダダ漏れですが、お互い色んな意味で好意を伝えきれません。
じれったいふたりの関係は、友情？ それとも……？

title.en: Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Kurokishi-sama o Horesasetai!

altTitles.ja: 崖っぷち令嬢は黒騎士様を惚れさせたい!

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakeppuchi Reijou wa Kurokishi-sama wo Horesasetai!

altTitles.es-la: ¡Quiero hacer que el Caballero Oscuro se Enamore de mi!

altTitles.en: I Want to Make Black-Knight Fall In Love With Me!

altTitles.pl: Chcę, żeby Czarny Rycerz Się We Mnie Zakochał

altTitles.en: A Noblewoman on the Brink of Disaster Wants to Make the Black Knight Fall in Love!

description.en: My family is in debt, and we don't have enough money for my sick sister's treatment... The troubled noble, Clarice, finds herself engaged in a political marriage with the most feared Black-Knight in the kingdom, Frost, known for "slaughtering beasts with his bare hands". In an attempt to secure the fortune, Clarice tries to seduce the "Black-Knight", but just as she does, she discovers "her" secret...
description.ja: 実家は借金まみれ、病気の妹を救うには治療費が足りない…。崖っぷちな子爵令嬢・クラリスが政略結婚をすることになったのは、「魔物を素手で屠る」とウワサの黒騎士・フロストだった！財産を握るため、どうにか”黒騎士様”を篭絡しようとした矢先、クラリスは“彼女”の秘密を知ってしまい…。
description.pl:
Moja rodzina jest zadłużona i nie mamy pieniędzy na leczenie chorej siostry...
Zmartwiona szlachcianka, Clarice, zostaje zaangażowana w polityczne małżeństwo z najbardziej przerażającym Czarnym Rycerzem w królestwie, Frostem, znanym z „zabijania bestii gołymi rękami”.
Chcąc zapewnić sobie fortunę, Clarice próbuje uwieść „Czarnego Rycerza”, ale gdy to robi, odkrywa „jej” sekret...
description.es-la:
Mi familia está endeudada, y no tenemos suficiente dinero para el tratamiento de mi hermana enferma...
La nobleza en apuros, Clarice, se encuentra comprometida en un matrimonio político con el Caballero Oscuro más temido del reino, Frost, quien es conocido por "matar bestias con sus propias manos"
Con la intención de asegurar la fortuna, Clarice intenta seducir al "Caballero Oscuro", pero justo cuando lo hace, descubre el secreto de "ella"...

description.en: Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

Would you like to reverse time?]
[All your abilities will be reset.]
[Please choose the date.]

“February 28th, 1985. The day I was born.”

Financial power. I will gather all the fortune of the world—
and create a monopoly. I will monopolize all the dungeons of the world.

I will do this now, while the world is still peaceful...
before it all begins.

**Original Webtoon:**
[Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%84%EC%83%9D%EC%9E%90/3130), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60754076) 

**Official Translations:**
[Simplified Chinese](https://pdt.tencentac.com/?adtag=appshare.ios.detail%26QQ%26392&contentId=392&platform=IA), [Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/134347)

title.en: Demon King of the Royal Class

altTitles.en: The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy

altTitles.es-la: El Principe Demonio va a la Academia

description.en:
Upon dying, the author of "The Demon King is Dead" is given two choices: go to hell or be reborn in his novel and survive till the end.

The problem? He's reborn as Baalier Junior, a weak demon prince, after his realm was conquered! To make things worse, his attempt to escape somehow gets him enrolled as a student of the Royal Class in Gradias Temple, a prestigious human school.

In the midst of plotlines and political schemes, can this author keep his identity a secret and reach a happy ending?

A young man named Jinfrey, decides to become an adventurer in order to earn a lot of money and make his family happy.

However, the moment he tries to become an adventurer, Jinfrey remembers the memory of his previous life.

This world that Jinfrey was born and raised, was exactly the same world as “Ground Seven”, a shitty game that he played in his previous life to the point where he was called a “Hardcore Player” !

Although confused by the suddenly revived memories, by using this knowledge, Jinfrey aims to become unparalleled with the help of the secret “Hidden Equipment” in this world.

Murong Qian, a fortune teller, foresees a disaster threatening his family. In a bid to save them, he aims to seduce the prince and gain power, only to discover that Prince He Cangxiao has a deadly fear of men. Yet, caught in the intoxicating allure of desire’s flowers, they share a night of passion. Now, torn between fear and lust, He Cangxiao can't stop craving Murong Qian. A whirlwind of pleasure ensues, engulfing them for a thousand and one nights!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official English](https://yaoi.kijimam.space/studio/?product=ebook1001-nights-series)

altTitles.ja: 宇宙ファラオ☆パトラちゃん

description.en:
Let's invade Earth during summer vacation!?

I, Princess Patra of Ptolemy, chose "Earth Invasion" for my summer vacation free study!
However, because of my comfortable life on Earth, I tend to fall behind on my homework!
Today is another peaceful day♪ (Thanks to Patra-chan's love for the Earth)

altTitles.en: Surviving as a Mage in a Magic Academy
How to Live as a Magic School Wizard
Life of a Magic Academy Mage

altTitles.zh: 魔法學校 魔法師로 살아가는 法

altTitles.es-la: La vida de un mago de la academia de magia

description.en:
Ehan was a stressed-out graduate student who vowed to never attend school again, until he was reborn as the third son of a noble family of mages. 

But since he isn't the sole heir, he has to make his own path by enrolling at Einrogard, the best magic school in the empire. And although everyone expects much from him, Ehan's time in academia has taught him that getting easy As is the best way to get through school. 

Despite his lack of ambition, can he graduate as a full-fledged mage?

"Can I... graduate safely?"

altTitles.en: How to train your brainrot girlfriend

altTitles.es-la: Tengo una novia con la percepción de la realidad alterada

altTitles.tl: Paano Sanayin ang Iyong Jowang Utakbulok

altTitles.vi: Bạn gái bại não của tôi

description.en: Brainrot Girlfriend

Do you want eternal life?

Red eyes, white skin, golden hair... Luna, our protagonist, is an apprentice magician who was bought by Khan, a shabby old magician. Luna is a prideful girl who spends her days learning magic in order to impress Khan, who has no interest in anything other than the study of magic.
Then, the previous king dies of illness, and rebellions erupt in various parts of the country. The kingdom is on the brink of destruction, but an army of undead attacks the rebels and puts them down.
Who in the world has used the forbidden necromancy?

altTitles.ja: 同窓会でせんせー持ち帰る話

altTitles.en: I Brought My Teacher Home From a Class Reunion

title.en: THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls - Daremasu Battle Royale (Doujinshi)
The Supporting Female Is Reborn, She Will No Longer Serve This Broken Plot

altTitles.zh: 女配重生，这破剧情她不伺候了

description.en:
Description
Yin Susu couldn't believe that she was reborn again, her life was repeating again, the setting was the same, the painful things were the same.

She thought that she would just become a salted fish,* living a lazy life, waiting for death, waiting for everything to end, for the female lead to die, which would mean the end of everything, but she did not want to accept her fate!

"If you, the female lead, has a golden hand, then I will break that golden hand."

*salted fish: metaphor of a corpse or a person who doesn't want to do anything.

After being murdered and reborn, An Zhi vowed to take revenge on the scumbag and the bitch, but accidentally "tarnished" the innocence of Pei Que, a banished immortal in the capital. An Zhi felt ashamed because Pei Que was not only handsome, but she also called him fourth uncle in her previous life. Until one day, An Zhi accidentally discovered his secret. It turned out that he had been plotting against her for a long time, and his previous kindness was a sweet trap for him to keep her captive.

altTitles.ko: 만 년 만 에 귀환 한 플레이어

description.en:
Oh Kangwoo the Demon King has had it with ruling over Hell and wants to return to Earth. 

But when he finally gets there, not only are his powers sealed, but the Earth he once knew has turned into an MMORPG free-for-all. 

Dimensional gates have appeared all over the world, and "players" enter them to make a living by hunting monsters. If Kangwoo wants to survive in this dangerous game, he's going to have to level up, and fast. 

But for this demon king, hell on earth might be worse than Hell itself!
description.ko:
어느 날, 갑작스럽게 지옥으로 떨어졌다. 
가진 것은 살고 싶다는 갈망과 포식의 권능 뿐.
 
일천의 지옥부터 구천의 지옥까지. 수만, 수십만의 악마를 잡아먹었고. 
마침내 일곱 대공까지 그 앞에 무릎을 꿇었다.
 
"어째서 돌아가려고 하십니까? 
왕께서는 이미 지옥의 모든 것을 가지고 계시지 않습니까."

"가지긴 뭘 다 가져."

먹을 것도, 즐길 것도 없다! 
지옥에 있는 거라고는 황량한 대지와 끔찍한 악마 뿐! 

"난 돌아갈 거야." 

만 년이라는 아득한 시간 만에 그가 지구로 귀환한다.


그러나.. 지구는 자신이 그동안 알던 지구가 아니었다.
description.ru:
Внезапно оказавшись в Аду, всё, что у него осталось это вера и тяга к жизни. Он уничтожал тысячи демонов на всех кругах Преисподней. Даже семь верховных герцогов Ада пали после встречи с ним.

— Владыка, зачем вам обратно на землю? Вся Преисподняя в ваших руках!

— Заткнись и продолжай подготовку к обряду!

Ни вкусной пищи, ни привычных развлечений… лишь ужасающие демоны и безжизненные пустыни.

— Как же хочется вернуться обратно домой…

Спустя 10,000 лет Игрок возвращается на землю.
description.uk:
Раптом опинившись в Пеклі, все, що в нього залишилося це віра і потяг до життя. Він знищував тисячі демонів на всіх колах пекла. Навіть сім верховних герцогів Ада впали після зустрічі з ним.

— Владико, навіщо вам назад на землю? Все пекло у ваших руках!

— Заткнися і продовжуй підготовку до обряду!

Ні смачної їжі, ні звичних розваг… лише жахливі демони та неживі пустелі.

— Як же хочеться повернутися додому…

Через 10.000 років Гравець повертається на землю.
description.pt-br: Um dia, KangWoo de repente foi para o Inferno, apenas com seu forte desejo de sobreviver e com sua Autoridade de Predação. Em todo seu caminho do 1ºinferno até o 9º, ele devorou centenas de milhares de demônios, até que os Sete Arquiduques finalmente se ajoelhassem diante dele. “Por que deseja voltar? Você já não possuí tudo aqui no Inferno, meu lorde?” “O que tenho exatamente?” Não tinha nada para comer, nem sequer um entretenimento! Ilhas desoladas e demônios medonhos preenchiam todo o Inferno. “Vou voltar.” Depois de dez mil anos no 9ºInferno, ele retornou à Terra.

description.en:
There is a dream worth putting two lives on the line for.  
  
Tsukasa, a young man with shattered dreams, and Inori, a girl no one believed in. However, in the face of adversity, those two possessed a tenacity towards the rink greater than anyone had ever known. Together, they meet on the ice, and aim for the world with their figure skating!

---

**Links:**  
- [Series' Twitter](https://twitter.com/medalist_AFT)
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA (U.S. Only)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10231/episode/318207), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/medalist/)
description.es:
Tsukasa es un patinador que, tras haber dejado atrás su sueño de convertirse en un atleta de élite por problemas económicos, trabaja realizando espectáculos de patinaje sobre hielo.

Pero todo cambia cuando conoce a Inori, una niña que acude a una pista de hielo a escondidas de su madre, aunque esta esté totalmente en contra de ello y todo el mundo piense que es tarde para ella, y que es demasiado inútil.

Así, gracias a la tenacidad que muestra Inori, Tsukasa decide convertirse en su entrenador y buscará ayudarla en el difícil mundo del patinaje artístico, prometiéndose que la llevará a la cima.
description.zh: 用利刃融化坚冰、开拓人生——！

description.en: An abused little girl with nothing to live for meets an old man with a nasty personality.
description.es-la: Una noche, una niña sirvienta se encuentra escapando de su sadico dueño noble, dirigiendose al lugar donde le dijo su persona mas querida ''alli hay 'álgo', pidele a ese 'álgo' que te proteja'' pero al llegar pasa algo inesperado...

description.en: This is a story about the main character named Inuyama, who is on the edge of life with no job or savings. One day, he is tasked with the role of "broadcast advisor" and "pseudo-boyfriend" of a gravure idol. Can he reach the top of the world of gravure in this romantic comedy harem? ♡
description.ja: 職なし、貯金なしの人生崖っぷちな主人公・狗山（いぬやま）が、ある日任されたのはグラビアアイドルの「配信アドバイザー」兼、「疑似彼氏」!? グラビア界のてっぺん目指すハーレムラブコメ♡
description.pt-br: Esta é uma história sobre o personagem principal chamado Inuyama, que está no limite da vida sem emprego ou economias. Um dia, ele é encarregado do papel de "assessor de transmissão" e "pseudo-namorado" de uma ídolo de fotografia. Ele pode chegar ao topo do mundo da fotografia neste harém de comédia romântica? ♡

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken: After the Rain

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件 after the rain

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais: After the Rain

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten: After the Rain

description.en: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まり二人は少しずつ惹かれあっていく――。

description.en:
The sequel to Konjiki no Gash!!, aka Zatch Bell.

Once the battle to decide the king of the demon world, in which 100 demon children fought against each other, had come to an end… the king of the demon world was crowned, and the demon world lived out the rest of its days in peace.

Or at least, that was how it was supposed to be.

Now, a shocking fact about the current state of the demon world comes to light. And in the depths of their despair, three demon children decide to risk it all for one last chance at survival.
description.it: Dopo la battaglia per decidere il re del mondo dei demoni, in cui 100 bambini demoni si sono combattuti tra loro... Fu deciso il re del mondo dei demoni e arrivarono giorni di pace... o almeno così si supponeva! Fatti scioccanti vengono rivelati sull'attuale mondo dei demoni. Al limite della disperazione, tre bambini demone fanno una scommessa!
description.pt-br: Uma vez terminada a batalha para decidir o Rei do mundo demoníaco, na qual 100 mamodos lutaram uns contra os outros… o Rei do mundo demoníaco foi coroado, e o mundo demoníaco viveu o resto de seus dias em paz.

altTitles.ja: テムパル〜アイテムの力〜

description.de:
Shin Youngwoo spielt mit seinem Avatar "Grid" das zurzeit beliebteste Virtual-Reality-Spiel der Welt: Satisfy.  
  
Ob in der Realität oder in-game, Shin scheint vom Unglück verfolgt zu werden. Doch als er nach der Suche nach einem Questgegenstand seine Belohnung erhält, kann er zu einer legendären Klasse wechseln. Einer Klasse, die außer ihm niemand der über 2 Milliarden Spielern besitzt.
description.en:
Shin Youngwoo (aka Grid), an unlucky man in life and a low-level player in the popular VR game Satisfy, finds a powerful item that earns him a rare legendary class title: Pagma’s Successor. Now a skilled blacksmith, he can forge unique weapons and equip the game’s most powerful gear!

Grid resolves to use his new abilities to achieve fame and fortune, but as his very existence begins to stir up trouble in Satisfy, he realizes that life as a legend may be more than he bargained for….
description.fa:
⁧⁧بزرگ‌ترین بازی واقعیت مجازی جهان «ستیسفای».  
⁧چه تو واقعیت و چه در دنیای مجازی شینگ وو کسی بود که همه‌ی بدبختی‌ها سرش می‌اومد.  
⁧اما تو میون این‌همه بدبختی‌، یه‌بار شانس بهش رو می‌کنه و تو یه مأموریت غیرممکن کتاب پاگما رو پیدا می‌کنه، کتابی افسانه‌ای که زندگی اون رو از این رو به اون رو می‌کنه.
description.fr:
Quand un joueur raté de VMMORPG tombe, lors d’une quête, sur un livre légendaire permettant de changer de classe, il en profite immédiatement. Attention joueurs, le plus grand de tous les forgerons est né ! Et il n‘a pas prévu de passer inaperçu !

---
- [Official French Translation](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/overgeared)
description.id:
Shin Youngwoo punya kehidupan yang bernasib sial. Ia terpaksa bekerja kasar di sebuah tempat kontruksi untuk membayar biaya sekolah dan uang game yang ia gunakan. Bahkan ia juga kerja kasar di VR Game yang bernama Satisfy. Namun, hidupnya mulai berubah ketika karakternya sebagai 'Grid' di game menemukan 'Pagma's Rare Book' hingga menjadi legendary class player.

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Kekuatan-Item/3406)
description.ja:
世界最高のバーチャルリアリティゲーム<SATISFY>。 全世界ユーザー数２０億人、もう一つの地球と呼ばれるほどの壮大なファンタジーゲーム。 しがない無職のゲーム中毒者である「長嶺巧」はゲーム課金の借金を返すために日雇い労働をする以外のほとんどの時間はゲームに費やしていた。 ある日、クエスト中にレジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞を手に入れた「巧」。 ＜ファグマの奇書＞売って大儲けできると思ったその瞬間…！新たなクエストが発動され殺される寸前になるが… このままだと殺され、レジェンダリー転職書＜ファグマの奇書＞もなくしてしまうと思った「巧」は＜ファグマの奇書＞を開き、伝説の職人＜ファグマの末裔＞へとジョブチェンジするが… 借金まみれの底辺人生から２０億プレイヤーの頂点に立つレジェンダリープレイヤーになれるのか！？

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/43170)
description.ko:
[신영우 (유저 네임: 그리드)]
세계 최고의 가상 현실 게임 <SATISFY>.

현실에서나, 게임 속에서나, 불운은 항상 그의 곁을 맴도는데....
퀘스트 수행 중 우연히 발견한 게임 속 로또, '파그마의 기서'. 
20억 명이 넘는 유저 중 유일한 최강의 레전드리 직업으로 전직.

"어떻게 아직 살아있는 거지...?!"

"뭐, 특별한 건 없고..."


"템빨이죠."

지긋지긋한 불운과 악몽 같은 빚쟁이 인생에서 벗어난
최강 플레이어 "그리드".
고인물도 울고 갈 끝판왕이 찾아온다!

[<SATISFY>에 접속합니다.]

웹툰 <템빨>은 매주 토요일 연재됩니다.
description.ru: В реальности, в играх, где бы он ни был, ему сопутствуют неудачи... Но в один момент всё меняется. В игре конце Северной пещеры он обнаружит квест, в котором найдёт "Редкую книгу Пагмы"... Ему удастся то, что не удалось сотням миллионов пользователей. - Как ты выжил? - Ничего особенного.
description.th:
ชินยองอู ID กริด ไม่ว่าจะในชีวิตจริงหรือในในโลกเกมเสมือนจริง SATISFY เขาก็เป็นตัวแทนแห่งความอับโชคไม่ต่างกัน...
แต่อยู่มาวันหนึ่ง กริด ได้พบกับตำราเปลี่ยนอาชีพที่นำเขาไปสู่การเปลี่ยนเป็นอาชีพระดับตำนาน 'ทายาทของแพ็กม่า'
อาชีพช่างตีเหล็กในตำนานที่จะทำให้เขาหลุดพ้นจากหนี้สิน พร้อมกับได้สัมผัส 'พลังแห่งไอเทม' และก้าวสู่การเป็นผู้เล่นที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุด!

---
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Overgeared/43)
description.zh:
无论是现实世界还是游戏世界中，他都是最底层的存在！然而咸鱼翻身的机会终于来了！只要能够找到游戏中的最强装备，就能获得超20亿玩家中唯一一个成为传说中最强职业电竞选手的机会！他能否在假想现实游戏世界中创造新的传奇，成功脱离如同噩梦般的悲惨人生呢？

---
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28630)
description.zh-hk:
[申英宇(使用者名稱：格里德)]
稱霸全球的虛擬實境遊戲《SATISFY》

無論現實還是遊戲中，他都是個「不幸」的象徵...
在解任務時偶然發現
遊戲中的樂透——「帕格瑪的奇書」，
並轉職成20億玩家中，僅只一名的最強傳奇級職業。

「你怎麼還活著...?!」

「嗯...也沒什麼啦...」

「靠裝備囉。」

脫離不幸與惡夢般的債務，
重生為最強玩家的「格里德」!
經典名著通通滾開，真正的王者駕到了!

[已成功登入《SATISFY》。]

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%A3%9D%E5%82%99%E4%BB%94/47)

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (U.S. Only)
description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب
خلافی شود به آنجا پـــــرت می‌شــود. رودو یتــیمی است که   در 
آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد
مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

description.en: In Gyeongseong, the city of glittering lights and glamorous desire, Gyeongseong Detective Agency has opened its doors at No. 45, District 1, Myeongchijeong. Sohwa, a 16-year-old servant girl, has nothing to her name but her wits and bravery. When she accidentally gets caught up in a secret scheme, she meets Jeong Haegyeong, a young man running his own detective agency. Chased by memories from the past, they must work together to clear her name.

altTitles.en: I Got a Fake Job at the Academy

altTitles.ru: Я получил фальшивую работу в академии

altTitles.uk: Я став хибним професором в академії

altTitles.pt-br: Eu tenho um emprego falso em uma academia

altTitles.fr: J'ai été embauché à tord à l'académie

altTitles.es-la: El profesor encubierto de la Academia

description.en:
Machiavelli and Gerrard are just one of the many names the new professor of Ceoren Academy uses to disguise his identity - and now he can add one more to his list, Professor Ludger Cherish. 

The real Ludger Cherish dies on board a train during a terrorist attack, making him the perfect target for a new identity. Little does the new professor know, Ludger Cherish was involved in something deep and secret. 

The new Professor Ludger has to be careful to not get caught by the school and the dangerous secret society.
description.it:
Non sono rinato con talento o capacità, ma almeno le mie conoscenze terrestri mi hanno permesso di stare un passo avanti in quest'altro mondo.

Qui la magia esiste, e i nuovi progressi della scienza si susseguivano rapidamente, mentre la magia ristagnava in nome della tradizione. Utilizzando le mie conoscenze terrene e non vincolato dal pensiero tradizionale, sono stato in grado di fare cose che altri maghi non potevano nemmeno immaginare.

Tuttavia, diventare inavvertitamente un professore sotto copertura per una misteriosa società segreta nella rinomata accademia di Sören non era mai stato nella mia lista di cose da fare!
description.ko:
정체를 숨기고 세계를 떠돌던 나는 열차 테러 사건에 휘말려
본의 아니게 아카데미의 교사가 되었다.
하지만, 위장당한 신분 또한 위장 신분이라는 걸 알고 위기에 봉착하게 되는데…
이 아슬아슬한 외줄 타기의 끝은 어디일까.
description.uk:
Я отримав фальшиву роботу в академії.
Я не переродився з талантом чи здібностями, але принаймні мої знання із Землі дозволили мені залишатися на крок попереду в цьому іншому світі.
Тут існує магія. Та і в науці швидко розвивався новий прогрес, тоді як магія застоювалася на благо традицій. Використовуючи свої знання з минулого життя і нетрадиційне мислення, я здатен був робити те, чого інші чарівники навіть не могли собі уявити.
Тим не менш, я став таємним професором таємничого товариства у знаменитій академії Сорен, а це ніколи не входило до мого списку справ!
description.pt-br:
Não renasci com talento ou habilidade, mas pelo menos meu conhecimento da terra me permitiu ficar um passo à frente neste outro mundo.

A magia existe aqui, e novos progressos estavam sendo feitos rapidamente com ciência ao passo em que a magia estagnou em nome da tradição. Usando meu conhecimento da terra e sendo livre do pensamento tradicional, fui capaz de fazer coisas que outros magos nem imaginavam.

Ainda assim, me tornar um professor disfarçado de uma misteriosa sociedade secreta na renomada academia de Sören nunca esteve nos meus planos!

altTitles.ja: ストーカー×ストーカー

description.en: Getta and Taiyo, college students who were close friends. One day, Taiyo finds out that he was stalking Getta. However, Getta is a stalker of the sun, and collects the baby teeth of the sun.

Due to an unidentified virus, which has affected the world, many people have turned into man-eating monsters and the screams of dying people have been swallowed by the cries of monsters.

'Kim Jongdo,' a boy who lived a grim life because he didn't receive the attention of those around him due to his inherent lack of presence, survived the apocalypse because he didn't receive attention from the monsters either, and for some reason, Kim Jongdo was also able to speak with some monsters.

While soothing loneliness by communicating with the monsters, he meets a girl 'Jo Myeong' who was in the same class as him during high school by chance.

Unlike the indifference around him, she was one of the few people who treated Kim Jongdo with interest, and that's how Kim Jongdo's "no presence" began to shake.
description.pt-br: Devido a um vírus de origem desconhecida, muitas pessoas se transformaram em monstros terríveis, e os gritos das pessoas foram engolidos pelo choro dos monstros. Kim Jongdo, que viveu uma vida sombria devido à sua falta inata de senso de existência, sobreviveu ao fim do mundo sem receber atenção mesmo dos monstros. Estranhamente, Kim Jongdo conseguiu conversar com alguns monstros. Enquanto encontrava um pouco de conforto na comunicação com os monstros, ele conheceu por acaso uma colega de escola chamada Jo Myeong. Diferentemente da indiferença que recebia, ela foi uma das poucas pessoas que demonstrou interesse genuíno por Kim Jongdo, e assim sua 'falta de existência' começou a ser abalada.

title.en: I Only Want to Beat You

altTitles.en: I Want to Beat You, Oh Roji
I Want to Defeat You, Oh Roji

description.en: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
description.uk: Головний герой Лі Ґіґо, який жодного разу в житті не програв, і головна героїня, яка перемогла його, О Роджі. Хто в підсумку стане переможцем в цьому «парі»?
description.es-la: El protagonista masculino que nunca ha sido derrotado en su vida 'gana', la heroína femenina 'solo' que hizo ese guiño pierde por primera vez ¿Quién será el ganador de esta 'apuesta'?

description.en: Hyeun is a genius dancer but has stage fright, and Suhyun is a beginner dancer but is not afraid of the stage. This is the Street Dance growth story of two different dancers!
description.ko:
천재 댄서이지만 무대 공포증을 지닌 혜은과,
초보 댄서이지만 무대를 두려워하지 않는 수현.
서로 다른 두 댄서의 스트릿 댄스 성장기!

title.en: Yuuki Yuuna wa Yuusha de Aru - The Hero Club's Activity Record, Ten Years Later (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Yuki Yuna is a Hero - The Hero Club's Activity Record, Ten Years Later
